---
title: Users Guide
---


## Start the Application

To start the application, navigate to the correct src folder in your terminal. Then, run the following command: `finreport`. This will initiate the backend of the application.

## Access the Application

Depending on the network configuration, other users on the same network can access the application by typing the IP address into their web browser. Ensure that your network settings allow this communication.

## Shutdown the Application

 shut down the app, simply type Control+C at the terminal. This will halt the program.

## Modify Templates Using VS Code

Templates are available on an as-needed basis. For modifications to the generic template verbiage and images, use Visual Studio Code (VS Code). Instructions for template creation are included separately.
